meanings.definition: A chariot drawn by four horses abreast.
meanings.sent1: The quadriga raced around the track at the ancient stadium.
meanings.sent2: The quadriga was beautifully decorated with intricate designs.
meanings.sent3: The quadriga driver accidentally dropped his reins and the horses went in different directions!
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was like a quadriga charging towards victory.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the quadriga crossing the finish line left the crowd in awe.

meanings.definition: A representation of a chariot drawn by four horses abreast, especially as a symbol of victory.
meanings.sent1: The quadriga sculpture stood proudly in the center of the square.
meanings.sent2: In ancient art, the quadriga often symbolized triumph and success.
meanings.sent3: The quadriga statue seemed to wink at the pigeons perched on its back.
meanings.sent4: The quadriga on the city emblem embodied the spirit of unity and strength.
meanings.sent5: The gleaming quadriga atop the building gleamed in the sunlight.
